Description:
The Logistics Specialist is responsible for planning and executing logistics operations and managing the supply chain within the organization. Their role aims to ensure a smooth and efficient flow of materials and products from sources to customers or intended destinations. The work involves coordinating and improving logistics processes while achieving a balance between cost and efficiency.Job Duties:Develop and implement logistics strategies that support the organization's business goals.
Plan and execute logistics strategies that meet the organization's goals and objectives.
Manage the movements of all procured goods and services required by the organization.
Conduct market research to identify new shipping routes and carriers.
Develop and implement logistics procedures and policies
Support and optimize the supply chain operations to reduce costs and improve efficiency.
Develop and manage relationships with suppliers and transportation providers.
Manage inventory levels and ensure that goods are delivered on time and in good condition.
Stay up-to-date with logistics regulations and ensure their practical implementation within our organization.
Responsible to complete all procurement team requests on time and make sure that all the payments are supported with needed documents.
Ensure to have a freight comprehension to give door to door freight fees estimation.
Create a database of imported items for storage MT standards planning.
Coordinate the warehousing and storage of inventory.
Compile and analyze logistics data to identify trends and opportunities for improvement.
Prepare and process import/export documentation.
Coordinate and manage forwarder billings.
Review and record required documentations.
Coordinate with customs brokers to ensure timely and accurate clearance of shipments.
Manage the risk of international shipments.
Stay up-to-date on international trade regulations.
Provide support to other departments as needed.
Preform other duties if required.Job Details
